revised_title: Enzyme Action in Linaceaes: Linase and the Presence of Cyanide in Flax Seeds
tldr: The authors studied the enzyme action in Linaceaes, specifically focusing on linase and its effects on linamarin and prunasin. They also investigated the presence of hydrogen cyanide in flax seeds and its potential impact on agriculture. The research involved growing various species of Linaceaes and analyzing the cyanophoric glucoside content in different stages of growth.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Biochemistry and Enzymology
